mapper.select: select MES_CODE, EMP_NO, MES_CONTENT, MES_DATE from message
select MES_CODE, EMP_NO, MES_CONTENT, MES_DATE from message
select MES_CODE, EMP_NO, MES_CONTENT, MES_DATE from message where MES_CODE = #{mesCode}
select emp_no from employee where emp_name = #{empName}

select m.mes_code, m.emp_no, mes_content, mes_date, mes_save, m.mes_date, mes_delete, e.emp_name, mr.mr_save from mesrec mr left outer join message m on(m.mes_code = mr.mes_code) left outer join employee e on(m.emp_no = e.emp_no) where mr.emp_no = #{empNo} order by m.MES_DATE desc
select MES_CODE, EMP_NO, MES_CONTENT, MES_DATE from message where MES_CODE = #{mesCode}

select m.MES_CODE, m.EMP_NO, m.MES_CONTENT, m.MES_DATE, (select EMP_NAME from EMPLOYEE where EMP_NO = mr.EMP_NO) as SEND_EMP_NO from MESSAGE m, MESREC mr where m.emp_no = #{empNo} and m.MES_CODE = mr.MES_CODE(+) order by m.MES_DATE desc
select m.MES_CODE, m.EMP_NO, m.MES_CONTENT, m.MES_DATE from message m, mesrec mr where m.mes_code = mr.mes_code and mr.mr_save = 'Y'
